display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
postgres_exporter:
├─ pg_stat_database
├─ pg_stat_replication
├─ pg_locks
├─ pg_stat_statements
├─ pg_stat_bgwriter
├─ pg_stat_activity
├─ pg_database_size
└─ pg_table_size

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
node_exporter:
├─ CPU usage
├─ Memory usage
├─ Disk I/O
├─ Network traffic
├─ Filesystem usage
└─ System load

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
pgbouncer_exporter:
├─ Active connections
├─ Waiting clients
├─ Pool size
├─ Database connections
└─ Query statistics

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Patroni metrics:
├─ Cluster state
├─ Leader status
├─ Replication lag
├─ Failover history
└─ Timeline changes
